wikipedia_page.main: Andy Thompson (21 January 1899 – 1 January 1970) was a professional footballer who played for Tottenham Hotspur, Chester, Norwich City, Clapton Orient, Ashford Town (Kent) and Northfleet.

response: *Andy Thompson (baseball) (born 1975), former Major League Baseball left fielder
*Andy Thompson (footballer, born in Sunderland) (fl. 1904–05), English football winger for Sunderland
